name: Labo #0000
description:
This is my first game. I want to clarify that this is an alpha version, there is only one level and many bugs. There is no story yet ...I created the game with construct 2 and Aseprite. The game does not contain audio either. Many updates will arrive. For the moment, there is only version 1.0.

You can contact me by email: spooky333.itch.io@gmail.com

This game is completely free.

You can report me the bugs and your return in the comment section and I would like to open soon a server of discord

Thank you
Spooky333
